body:
So, I want to tell my parents why I want to stay on games a lot but there is no way to get really good proof unless I ask the source, so I wanted to ask you guys (please answer truthfully) what you guys think of me, meaning what do you think of when you here of vladthegreat100

Also copy and paste the following and bold the one that you  believe

I think vladthegreat100 and I are good friends.
I think vladthegreat100 and I are friends.
I have never talked to him so I can't hate him or be friends with him
I don't like vladthegreat100

Thanks Guys
If you guys write something bad at me don't worry, I won't hate you :P

Thanks
Vlad

replies.body:
Thanks everybody who posted :D after these 2 pages of posts my parents have finally realised why I spend so much time. Just so you guys don't feel left out and don't know why I posted this here it is.

First of all, I was never a person that too many people liked in life, for grade 7-8 I only had 3 friends all along, but around 1/3 of the way through 8th grade Porky brought me into this community where I felt like a real familly, there are its ups and downs but to be honest, playing video games, making youtube videos and talking on ts or skype is social to me, I am really anti-social but this community makes me feel like I am not. Thank you guys for keeping me happy and thanks for all people who helped out to got my parents to finally understand me and to let me continue with games <3 I have no idea what I would do without you guys or games. It just brings me joy <3
replies.body_tagged:

First of all, I was never a person that too many people liked in life, for grade 7-8 I only had 3 friends all along, but around 1/3 of the way through 8th grade Porky brought me into this community where I felt like a real familly, there are its ups and downs but to be honest, playing video games, making youtube videos and talking on ts or skype is social to me, I am really anti-social but this community makes me feel like I am not. Thank you guys for keeping me happy and thanks for all people who helped out to got my parents to finally understand me and to let me continue with games <3 I have no idea what I would do without you guys or games. It just brings me joy <3

replies.body:
How long do you spend on video games a day?
If the answer is more than a few hours then it would do you good to actually pull back a little bit.
There is nothing wrong with letting up on your games, your parents are most probably doing this because they care for your well-being.
replies.body_tagged:
How long do you spend on video games a day?
If the answer is more than a few hours then it would do you good to actually pull back a little bit.
There is nothing wrong with letting up on your games, your parents are most probably doing this because they care for your well-being.

replies.body:
That is a very good point. I limit my gaming time to about 2 hours a day.
If you spend to much time on the computer, it has the ability to "close brain paths". With basically means it can be harder to be creative.
It can also lead to problems like depersonalization.

Oh my gosh, this was like the anti-computer comment. Sorry.
